SETRESUME.desc: Set resume mode. Clear on start or resume acquiring into same spectrum.

SETPRESETVALUE.desc: set the preset acquisition value for all channels

SETPRESETTYPE.desc: set the preset acquisition type for all channels

SETPEAKTIME1.desc: Peaking time of the energy filter

GETPEAKTIME1.desc: Peaking time of the energy filter

GETDYNRANGE1.desc: Energy range corresponding to 40% of the total ADC range

SETBASELENGTH1.desc: Set the number of samples averaged in the baseline filter, specified as number of samples

GETBASELENGTH1.desc: Get the number of samples averaged in the baseline filter, specified as number of samples

GETBINWIDTH1.desc: Width of the individual bin in the MCA spectrum

SETMAXENERGY1.desc: Set the maximum energy for the spectrum

GETMAXENERGY1.desc: Get the maximum energy for the spectrum

SETRESETDELAY1.desc: The time the processor should wait after the detector resets before continuing processing of the input signal

GETRESETDELAY1.desc: The time the processor should wait after the detector resets before continuing processing of the input signal

SETMAXWIDTH1.desc: The maximum peak width for pile-up inspection

NumRowChunks.desc: Number of rows to use per chunk

NumRowChunks_RBV.desc: Readback of number of rows to use per chunk

ExtraDimSizeN.desc: Size of extra dimension N (no. of frames per point)

ExtraDimSizeN_RBV.desc: Readback size of extra dimension N (no. of frames per point)

ExtraDimSizeX_RBV.desc: Readback size of extra dimension X

ExtraDimSizeY_RBV.desc: Readback size of extra dimension Y

runtime.desc: Total runtime from first frame to file closed

IOSpeed.desc: Overall IO speed from first frame to file closed

Compression.desc: Select or switch off compression filter

NumBitPrecision.desc: N-bit compression filter: number of data bits per pixel

NumBitPrecision_RBV.desc: Readback N-bit compression filter: number of data bits per pixel

NumBitOffset.desc: N-bit compression filter: dataword bit-offset in pixel

NumBitOffset_RBV.desc: Readback N-bit compression filter: dataword bit-offset in pixel

szipNumPixels.desc: szip compression filter: number of pixels in filter

szipNumPixels_RBV.desc: Readback szip compression filter: number of pixels in filter

ZCompressLevel_RBV.desc: Readback zlib compression filter: compression level
